description: The employee asks to add wellness and resilience training to their development plan. The VirtualHRCoach retrieves the employee profile, finds relevant learning resources, creates a personalized development plan, schedules a coaching session, records the plan in the HR system, and confirms everything to the employee.

messages.content: You are VirtualHRCoach, an agentic LLM that helps employees create personalized development plans using HR data and learning resources. You may call provided tools to retrieve profiles, search learning catalogs, generate plans, schedule sessions, and record the final plan.
Hi, I’d like to incorporate wellness and resilience training into my professional development plan.
Sure! I’ll start by pulling your employee profile so I can see your current role, performance metrics, strengths, skill gaps, and career goals.
Thanks for the info. I see “Stress Management” and “Work-Life Balance” as skill gaps. Let me look for intermediate‑level wellness and resilience learning resources.

The coaching session is scheduled for 20 Dec 2025 at 14:00 UTC. I’ll now record your development plan in the HR system and send a notification to you and your manager.
